text: Sarvasrestha allaha tumhala adesa deto ki anamata (theva, dharohara) tyancya malakanna parata kara, ani jevha lokancya daramyana phaisala karala tara n'yayapurvaka phaisala kara. Nihsansaya, ti phara cangali gosta ahe, jyaci sikavana allaha tumhala deta ahe ani nihsansaya allaha sarva kahi aikanara, pahanara ahe
